content: i want to learn super claude. It is already installed.
I'll help you learn SuperClaude! Created learning plan with TodoWrite tool covering: basic commands, persona system, MCP integration, flag system, and wave orchestration.
make a list of the concepts so i can have an overview

Created comprehensive SuperClaude concepts overview covering: Core Framework (17 commands, 11 personas, 4 MCP servers), Execution Modes (traditional/wave/delegation/loop), Intelligence Systems, and Quality & Safety frameworks.
i want to learn the concepts before i jump into a practical thing.

Started SuperClaude Conceptual Framework Deep Dive explaining: Core Philosophy (evidence-based AI development), Foundational Concepts (compound intelligence, context-aware adaptation, progressive enhancement), interrupted by /session-start command.

Successfully executed /session-start super-claude-learning: Created GitHub repository, initialized workspace, set up context management, completed all 10 setup steps. Repository: https://github.com/D9kej5892KfW/super-claude-learning
Explained SuperClaude Meta-AI Theory Revolution covering: Emergent AI Consciousness, Wave Theory, Persona Theory, MCP Server Theory, Orchestration Theory, and Practical Magic concepts.
Created SuperClaude-Theory-Guide.md with comprehensive checklist covering 6 major sections, 35+ checkboxes, progress tracker, and practical exercises for structured learning.
Learning progress: Completed Emergent AI Consciousness Patterns and Persona Theory sections, working through MCP Server Theory integration concepts.

Explained MCP integration in SuperClaude context: orchestrated coordination vs individual usage, intelligence multiplication, coordination patterns, persona-driven selection. Updated theory guide progress to 3/6 sections (50% complete).
Requested theory guide be saved to ~/claude-code/21-07/ instead of session repository, updated checkmarks to green checkmarks, and asked for learning recommendation.
Moved theory guide to ~/claude-code/21-07/, updated all completed sections to use green checkmarks (âœ…), recommended Wave Theory as next section for natural progression and practical impact.
